content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ITIL was created as a set of best practices to ensure IT services are aligned to the needs of the business and support its core processes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Watch the following video tutorial on ITIL basicsÂ \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"file://epam.com/projects/Minsk/EPM-HELP/ServiceDeskEducationProgram/ITIL/ITIL_Overview_2011_Edition.avi\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\\\\\\epam.com\\\\projects\\\\Minsk\\\\EPM-HELP\\\\ServiceDeskEducationProgram\\\\ITIL\\\\ITIL_Overview_2011_Edition.avi\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
